DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effect pharmacodynamics pharmacokinetics food morning versus even single multiple dos ONO-5334 healthy post menopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effects Food Morning Versus Evening Single Multiple Doses ONO-5334 Healthy Post Menopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 2 part . Part 1 ; The study investigate effect morning versus even dose pharmacodynamics multiple dos 150 mg ONO-5334 healthy post menopausal woman . The study design single-blind 16 subject enrol . Part 2 ; The study investigate effect food pharmacokinetics single dose 150mg ONO-5334 healthy post menopausal woman . 12 subject enrol .
DOC.criteria: Healthy caucasian woman age 55 75 year inclusive Subjects weigh least 50 kg mass index 19 30 kg/m2 inclusive Subjects amenorrhoeic least 5 year . Subjects confirm Screening Visit oestradiol follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level consistent menopause Subjects clinically relevant history presence clinically significant disease disorder Subjects clinically relevant history insomnia sleep disorder
